etymology.description: Depicts a tree with branches and roots
etymology.interpretation: The character 木(mù) depicts a tree, showing the trunk in the center and two slanting lines representing branches or roots. It directly signifies the concept of wood or a tree.

examples.chinese: 这把椅子的主要材料是木(這把椅子的主要材料是木)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè bǎ yǐzi de zhǔyào cáiliào shì mù.
examples.english: The main material of this chair is wood.

examples.chinese: 工匠精心雕刻木(工匠精心雕刻木)，制成精美家具(制成精美家具)。
examples.pinyin: Gōngjiàng jīngxīn diāo kè mù, zhìchéng jīngměi jiājù.
examples.english: The craftsman carefully carved the wood, crafting exquisite furniture.
